overview: A collection of films in various styles which concern with New York as the subject compiled by the request of the Donnel Library in New York.  ‘New York Scene’ (1967) is sketches of certain scenes and portraits in New York including, ‘Linda with a lens’, ‘Fire hydront on Broadway’, ‘Jack Smith with his ‘Flaming Creatures’, ‘Akiko on the roof’, and ‘A hippie at the Central Park’.
title: New York Scene
